title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit              Welcome to Theodore Roosevelt National Park   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:50 seconds  A welcome message from Theodore Roosevelt himself.          Directions - Theodore Roosevelt National Park is located in three separate units in western North Dakota.  Operating Hours & Seasons - The park is open year-round, though some facilities close seasonally. Fees & Passes - The park collects an entrance fee. This section contains information about the fees and passes available. Academic Fee Waivers - Educational groups visiting the park as part of an academic curriculum may be eligible for an entrance fee waiver. Things to Do - If you are looking for outdoor adventure, visitor centers and museums, camping, ranger programs, or other things to do in the area, you will find information about it here. Things to Know Before You Come - Plan ahead for a visit to the area with information on safety, weather, wheelchair accessibility, and traveling with pets. Know your options when it comes to food and lodging.
